name: cmintey-wishlist
description: wishlist is a self-hosted wish list manager where users can track items they want, share lists with friends or family, and avoid duplicate gifts. It focuses on simplicity, privacy, and easy sharing through a web-based interface.
features: Item management: Add items with names, descriptions, links, and prices to organize your wishes.
List sharing: Share wish lists with family and friends via unique URLs without requiring accounts.
Claim tracking: Mark items as claimed to prevent duplicate purchases while keeping surprises intact.
Multiple lists: Create separate lists for different occasions like birthdays, holidays, or general wants.
Priority levels: Assign priority to items so others know what matters most to you.
Image support: Attach images to items for visual reference and easier identification.
Price tracking: Record item prices to help gift-givers stay within budget.
User accounts: Create accounts for multiple family members on a single instance.
Privacy controls: Set lists as public, private, or shared only with specific people.
Mobile friendly: Access and manage wish lists from any device with a responsive design.
Import links: Automatically fetch item details when pasting product URLs from popular retailers.
Notification system: Get notified when items are claimed or when someone views your list.
